title: help me lol 3
body: ~~_**last few items ive been gifted just said i received a gift but im not too sure what they were is there anyway you can see what they are like whats been recently added to your collection. i got a gift from rito the other day but it didnt tell me what it was and thats happened a few times and im not even sure if i even get anything lol but yeah just asking thanks

replies.body:
I checked your account and it seems the last gift popup from us was for the Poro King Icon.

If you have any other questions, let me know!
If you go to the store and check under purchase history while in account section (near the purchase RP button) you should be able to see all your recent received gifts.
